content.question: Which sample of acid would require the largest number of moles of <math alttext="N a O H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>NaOH</mi></math> to neutralize it completely?

skill.text: 2.B: Formulate a hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
